column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////which helps to seal in the flavor and gives it a nice crispy finish on top. My wife liked it very much. For me
column2: the star of the evening was dessert
column4: fried apple pie. It took a bit of time to come out
column5: but it was worth it. The symmetry of the pie and it's ice cream scoop make it IG-worthy. It was one of the most delicious takes I've had on apple pie. All of the aforementioned items were suggested by our server
column7: we were very satisfied with her choices. Later
column8: she gave us a quick tour of the very opulent whiskey room
column9: with 300 bottles to choose from...very impressive.
